pre_caption: The scene opens with a close-up shot centered on the heads of a man and a woman lying on the floor. The camera then slowly pulls back while rotating clockwise, transitioning into a high-angle, wide shot. In the final composition, the full bodies of the man and woman are visible in the center of the frame, positioned in the middle ground. They lie on their backs with their heads together, their bodies extending in opposite directions. They are surrounded by a circle of scattered black and white photographs on the floor, also in the middle ground. A long, rectangular lamp on a stand becomes visible in the middle ground, positioned above their bodies. The camera is positioned directly above the subjects, maintaining a bird's-eye view throughout the transition.
